name: ThemeHunk Customizer
author: ThemeHunk

sections.description: ThemeHunk Customiser plugin will allow you to add features of testimonial, team and service section. Which will be visible on front page of site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the themehunk-customizer.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How to Install Plugin

Just upload the themehunk-customizer.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, and then activate it from ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  1. Support Forum
